title: Rod Stewart Adds Final Extension to Vegas Residency
description: Six additional shows for his ongoing Vegas residency at Caesars Palace will occur from September 24th to October 4th. Rod Stewart Adds Final Extension to Vegas Residency Jaeden Pinder
author: Jaeden Pinder
excerpt: Rod Stewart has announced six final shows for his Vegas residency at Caesars Palace taking place from September 24th through October 4th.
text: Sir Rod Stewart has just announced six new shows to his ongoing Vegas residency. Dubbed “The Encore Shows,” Stewart will return to Sin City between September 24th and October 4th. Get Rod Stewart Tickets Here Tickets go on sale this Friday, March 21st at 10:00 a.m. PT via Ticketmaster. If you’re a Citi cardmember, a special pre-sale for the fall Vegas shows begins this Tuesday, March 18th at 10:00 a.m. PT. Two more pre-sales are also occurring: one for fan club members this Wednesday, March 19th at 10:00 a.m. PT and another for members of Caesars Rewards, Caesars Entertainment’s loyalty program, and LiveNation/Ticketmaster customers, on Thursday March 20th at 10:00 a.m. PT. Stewart already had shows the Colosseum scheduled in March, May, and June. Additionally, he’s set to embark on his “One Last Time Tour” with Cheap Trick this summer, and also play a pair of stadium shows with Billy Joel. Check out Stewart’s full tour itinerary below, and get tickets here. html:
Sir Rod Stewart has just announced six new shows to his ongoing Vegas residency. Dubbed “The Encore Shows,” Stewart will return to Sin City between September 24th and October 4th.

Get Rod Stewart Tickets Here

Tickets go on sale this Friday, March 21st at 10:00 a.m. PT via Ticketmaster. If you’re a Citi cardmember, a special pre-sale for the fall Vegas shows begins this Tuesday, March 18th at 10:00 a.m. PT. Two more pre-sales are also occurring: one for fan club members this Wednesday, March 19th at 10:00 a.m. PT and another for members of Caesars Rewards, Caesars Entertainment’s loyalty program, and LiveNation/Ticketmaster customers, on Thursday March 20th at 10:00 a.m. PT.

Stewart already had shows the Colosseum scheduled in March, May, and June. Additionally, he’s set to embark on his “One Last Time Tour” with Cheap Trick this summer, and also play a pair of stadium shows with Billy Joel. Check out Stewart’s full tour itinerary below, and get tickets here.

Rod Stewart’s Las Vegas Residency:
